segment.target: Sometimes, time seems to slow down. Some say time changes; duration doesn’t matter, and every moment feels eternal. In such a moment, **{character}** effortlessly shoots **{target_character}** in the head, and they collapse.
**{character}** grabs {character_gender, select, female {her} other {his}} blaster and fires precise shots at **{target_character}**...
There’s barely a blink between **{character}**’s shot and the impact on **{target_character}**.

Let the roar of blasters echo—only the survivors will talk about it. **{character}** is well-positionned to witness it. **{target_character}** loses {target_character_gender, select, female {her} other {his}} hearing.
**{character}** bends, draws, and fires quickly at **{target_character}**, who is hit in the head!
A quick shot from **{character}** knocks **{target_character}** off balance.
Click... Click... **{character}** just missed a big opportunity...

Violence is the refuge of incompetence. **{character}** should have refrained. {character_gender, select, female {Her} other {His}} weapon is now on the ground, much to **{target_character}**’s delight.
**{character}** fails spectacularly, accidentally turning {character_gender, select, female {her} other {his}} weapon against themselves.
**{character}** trips on an imaginary pony and falls backward!
Click... Click... **{character}**’s weapon has jammed.
**{character}** successfully lands a headshot on **{target_character}**.
**{character}** takes {character_gender, select, female {her} other {his}} time to aim at **{target_character}**. Ouch...
**{target_character}** miraculously dodges a burst from **{character}**.
**{character}** empties {character_gender, select, female {her} other {his}} magazine into **{target_character}**.
The buttstock of {character_gender, select, female {her} other {his}} rifle gets in **{character}**’s way. **{target_character}**’s foot is now a mess.
Click click click... **{character}**’s weapon jams. **{target_character}** might be grateful for it.
When firing at **{target_character}**, **{character}** got burnt with {character_gender, select, female {her} other {his}} weapon. Spectacular work.
**{character}** should have better anticipated the recoil, missing **{target_character}** and injuring {character_gender, select, female {her} other {his}} own shoulder. Bravo.
A heavy weapon deals major damage—especially to **{character}**’s foot...
No words can describe the incredible acrobatics of **{character}**’s weapon as it lands on the ground...
With sharp eyes and a fiery resolve, **{character}** magnificently lands a shot right in **{target_character}**’s chest...
A reminiscence of fencing lessons or just a stroke of luck, **{character}** pierces through **{target_character}**'s defense effortlessly.
**{character}** thrusts at **{target_character}** with mastery.
**{character}** slashes off a large chunk of **{target_character}**, it's disgusting...
**{character}** drives their blade into one of **{target_character}**'s arm joints, which now dangles sadly...
Perhaps a mistimed dodge, perhaps a wrong move, perhaps a poor imitation of combat seen in a holodisc... **{target_character}** impales themselves heavily on **{character}**'s blade.
Zip, **{character}**'s weapon elegantly dodges **{target_character}** only to crash into an insolent wall. The blade breaks.
**{character}** misses **{target_character}** by a wide margin, and the impact against the nearby wall makes them bite their tongue and break their blade...
In a grand, impressive motion aimed at **{target_character}**, **{character}** pulls a back muscle. Unfortunate.
**{character}** successfully lands a headshot on **{target_character}**.
**{character}** takes {character_gender, select, female {her} other {his}} time to aim at **{target_character}**. Ouch...
**{target_character}** miraculously dodges a burst from **{character}**.
**{character}** empties {character_gender, select, female {her} other {his}} magazine into **{target_character}**.
The buttstock of {character_gender, select, female {her} other {his}} rifle gets in **{character}**’s way. **{target_character}**’s foot is now a mess.
Click click click... **{character}**’s weapon jams. **{target_character}** might be grateful for it.
When firing at **{target_character}**, **{character}** got burnt with {character_gender, select, female {her} other {his}} weapon. Spectacular work.
**{character}** should have better anticipated the recoil, missing **{target_character}** and injuring {character_gender, select, female {her} other {his}} own shoulder. Bravo.
A heavy weapon deals major damage—especially to **{character}**’s foot...
No words can describe the incredible acrobatics of **{character}**’s weapon as it lands on the ground...
With sharp eyes and a fiery resolve, **{character}** magnificently lands a shot right in **{target_character}**’s chest...
**{character}** successfully lands a headshot on **{target_character}**.
**{character}** takes {character_gender, select, female {her} other {his}} time to aim at **{target_character}**. Ouch...
**{target_character}** miraculously dodges a burst from **{character}**.
**{character}** empties {character_gender, select, female {her} other {his}} magazine into **{target_character}**.

When firing at **{target_character}**, **{character}** got burnt with {character_gender, select, female {her} other {his}} weapon. Spectacular work.
**{character}** should have better anticipated the recoil, missing **{target_character}** and injuring {character_gender, select, female {her} other {his}} own shoulder. Bravo.
A heavy weapon deals major damage—especially to **{character}**’s foot...
No words can describe the incredible acrobatics of **{character}**’s weapon as it lands on the ground...
With sharp eyes and a fiery resolve, **{character}** magnificently lands a shot right in **{target_character}**’s chest...
**{character}** caught **{target_character}** with a big right hook... who then repainted the wall with their nose...
**{character}** caught **{target_character}** with a majestic uppercut...
**{character}** tried to hit **{target_character}**, alas their feeble attempt missed and hit the wall... Ouch...
:grenade: Ploc...ploc...ploc...pschhhhh... **{character}** takes cover while the others look down. The explosion blows everyone away!
:grenade: Ploc...poc...poc...pschhhhh... **{character}** takes cover while the others look at their feet. Oh look, a gre...
:grenade: Ploc...poc...poc...pschhhhh...**{character}** takes cover while the others look at their feet. But...? Nothing happens... The admins are impressed, you've managed to do the impossible.

**{character}** adjusts their aim on **{target_character}** but inadvertently slips and fires their rocket. Just missing its target, a powerful explosion blows away both **{character}** and **{target_character}**.
A surprise migraine catches **{character}** off guard, they miss their rocket shot recklessly, **{target_character}** can be grateful for that.

Due to direly poor luck, the manual for the rocket launcher is 2234 pages long. Unfortunate for **{character}**, who only read 2233 of them. On the last one, it was clearly stated not to press the red button.
A solar wind disturbs the conversation between **{character}**'s rocket launcher and **{target_character}**. The rocket spins out of control and debris rain down.
By some miracle, or was it serendipity... **{target_character}** dodges **{character}**'s rocket which crashes into the background...

**{character}** attempted to {weapon, select, bare_hands {hit} knife {stab **{target_character}** with a bladed weapon} other {shoot at}} **{target_character}**, but {target_character, select, female {her} other {his}} protective clothing did its job.
